content.text: If you want to turn on a few lights in a row, you can use an arc. It is like a line, and you just need to tell the command a start and end for it. Type light.arc(a9, a3, color = magenta) to turn the top half magenta.
Then type light.arc(a4, a8, color = cyan) to turn the bottom half cyan.
Well done. Now press MAKE . Can you get them to animate now?
